channel.title: Hi, I'm Rafael Vital
channel.description: Recent content on Hi, I'm Rafael Vital

item.title: About
item.description: Hello, my name is Rafael Vital and I’m a Brazilian Indie Game Developer. I am from Bahia, Brazil. I studied Digital Games at the State University of Bahia (UNEB) My main skill is programming but I also like to dabble with different areas of game development such as game design and art. Here is my resume.
